view

类 CountryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CountryView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Observer

    public class CountryView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Responsible for visualizing the Country object, show useful info to user Corresponding Observable subject is Country

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CountryView(View view)
      Create a default CountryView, add View reference, load the countryPane from Country.xml

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clicked()
      Called by countryController when countryPane is clicked by user Pass this event to view
      Country getCountry()
      Used during fortification phase, View then get the relative country info and do the verification Called by View.drawMap()
      javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getCountryPane()
      View use this function to add/remove the countryPane to the mapRootPane or clear the countryPane's component Called by View.*()
      int getId()
      Get the country id as key Called by View when store CountryView into CountryViews HashMap
      void update(java.util.Observable obj, java.lang.Object x)
      Observer update method, update all Country info, store and set it to countryPane Called by corresponding Country Observable subject

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CountryView

        public CountryView(View view)
        Create a default CountryView, add View reference, load the countryPane from Country.xml
        参数:
        view - Default country view

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obj,
                   java.lang.Object x)
        Observer update method, update all Country info, store and set it to countryPane Called by corresponding Country Observable subject
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
        参数:
        obj - The relative Country Observable object
        x - Additional info for update

      • getCountryPane

        public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getCountryPane()
        View use this function to add/remove the countryPane to the mapRootPane or clear the countryPane's component Called by View.*()
        返回:
        the countryPane reference

      • clicked

        public void clicked()
        Called by countryController when countryPane is clicked by user Pass this event to view

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get the country id as key Called by View when store CountryView into CountryViews HashMap
        返回:
        countryView Id

      • getCountry

        public Country getCountry()
        Used during fortification phase, View then get the relative country info and do the verification Called by View.drawMap()
        返回:
        Country reference
